price: (Ẹ rántí Ànábì) Zakariyyā nígbà tí ó pe Olúwa rẹ̀ pé: “Olúwa mi, má fi mí sílẹ̀ ní èmi nìkan (tí kò níí bímọ). Ìwọ sì lóore jùlọ nínú àwọn olùjogún.”¹
arabic: وَزَكَرِيَّآ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥ رَبِّ لَا تَذَرۡنِي فَرۡدٗا وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wazakariyyā idh nādā rabbahu rabbi lā tadharnī fardan wa-anta khayru al-wārithīna
